title: Overwatch 2 is now the worst-rated game of all time on Steam
description: It seems as though most players are review bombing the game because of the free-to-play shooter's monetization model.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 has beaten Zelda Tears of the Kingdom to become the best-reviewed game of 2023
description: Baldur's Gate 3 has knocked Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom off the top spot to become 2023's best-reviewed game.

title: Tekken 8's director says your "silly threats" won't help get your favorite character on the roster
description: "By behaving excessively, the requests will be far from being realized"

title: Google Pixel Watch 2 leak reveals a new watch strap – but one feature is missing
description: It looks as though we're going to get a new strap with the Pixel Watch 2, but perhaps no ultra-wideband.

title: Fresh iPhone 15 Pro leaks hint at the raw power of Apple's next flagship phone
description: A couple of leaks suggest that the iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max will offer a leap in performance.

title: Full throttle: How AWS is helping craft a more exciting for Formula 1
description: The future of Formula 1 is data-driven, and AWS is in the driving seat.
